nodes.text: The Wookiee Warblade was a common weapon among Wookiee warriors who would wield in the blade in constant motion, allowing for deadly strikes. The warblade was a cumbersome weapon for non-Wookiees but was perfectly wieldy for the Wookiees who carried them. This melee weapon was seen among warriors during the Great Sith War. One was seen on Lehon in 3956 BBY.
Although it is a double-bladed weapon, there is a glitch in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic that allows the player to wield it in one hand, with another weapon in the other hand.
